result.detailedDescription: Radius is a predictive marketing and sales platform. Its smart prospecting list application takes the most comprehensive data set on each small and medium-sized business in America and turns it into actionable insights for anyone whose target market is small business. Radius provides prospect data like contact info and business information in addition to social media activity from Facebook, Twitter, Google, Foursquare and more. Radius can sync prospect data to Salesforce or append current leads with better data. Radius is available on the Salesforce App Exchange.
result.shortDescription: Predictive marketing and sales platform
result.name: Radius

result.detailedDescription: Provider of online research data, consumer insights and market analytics services. The company operates large proprietary opinion panels to collect survey responses on brands, politics, media, and consumer behaviour, then applies weighting and analytics to produce statistically robust datasets. Its products and services include brand tracking, audience profiling, campaign evaluation, and custom research, delivered through technology platforms and syndicated data tools for businesses, media and public institutions. Panel members participate in surveys and earn rewards, enabling continuous, real-time measurement of public attitudes and market trends.
result.shortDescription: Provider of online research data, consumer insights and market analytics services
result.name: YouGov
